captcha.title: CaptchaConfig
captcha.description: Captcha personalization options. You can test these live in @link https://vanilla-captcha-demo.vercel.app/server-captcha

length.description: Length of the captcha shown in the authentication page, recommended to use a low value for development. @default 5

backgroundColor.description: CSS color of the captcha background. Can use other css variants other than hex. @default "#FFFFFF"

font.description: Font of the characters in the captcha. @default "Arial"

fontSize.description: Font size of the characters in the captcha. @default 30

fontWeight.description: Font size of the characters in the captcha. @default 600

fontColor.description: CSS color of the captcha text. Can use other css variants other than hex. @default "#777777"

lineColor.description: CSS color of the lines that strike the captcha text. Can use other css variants other than hex. @default "#777777"

lineAmount.description: Number of lines that strike over the captcha. @default 10

lineWidth.description: Width of lines that strike over the captcha. @default 1

hide.description: The list of user distinguishedNames or sAMAccountNames that should not be shown in the /users view dropdowns and search. Accessing directly to /users/[dn] of a user that is listed here will result on a '403 This user is hidden by configuration' error, however, signing in as a listed user will not result in error. @default []

limit.description: The maximum amount of users allowed in the directory. If set to null the limit will be ignored. Default users are included in the count. @default null

hide.description: The list of group distinguishedNames or sAMAccountNames that should not be shown in the /groups view dropdowns and search. Accessing directly to /groups/[dn] of a user that is listed here will result on a '403 This user is hidden by configuration' error. @default []

limit.description: The maximum amount of groups allowed in the directory. If set to null the limit will be ignored. Default groups are included in the count. @default null
